Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime.rfc2047

Class RFC2047Encoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime.rfc2047.RFC2047Encoder
  • public class RFC2047Encoder
extends java.lang.Object
    High-performance RFC 2047 encoder for MIME header encoding. Implements selective encoding that groups nearby non-ASCII sequences to reduce fragmentation while maintaining compatibility with native message-library behaviour. This implementation uses character-by-character processing for optimal performance and precise control over encoding boundaries.
    Author:
    Chris Burdess
    See Also:
    RFC 2047

      • getEncodingForData

        public static java.lang.String getEncodingForData​(byte[] data)
        Determines the optimal encoding ("B" for Base64 or "Q" for Quoted-Printable) based on which will produce a smaller encoded result.

        Heuristic: Q-encoding encodes each byte that requires encoding as 3 characters (=XX), while B-encoding (Base64) expands all data by approximately 4/3 (33%). If more than ~16.7% of bytes need encoding, Base64 is more efficient.

        Parameters:
        data - the bytes to analyze
        Returns:
        "B" for Base64 or "Q" for Quoted-Printable

      • getEncodingForData

        public static java.lang.String getEncodingForData​(byte[] data,
                                                  int start,
                                                  int end)
        Determines the optimal encoding for a portion of data.
        Parameters:
        data - the bytes to analyze
        start - start index (inclusive)
        end - end index (exclusive)
        Returns:
        "B" for Base64 or "Q" for Quoted-Printable

                                                 java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Encode a header value using RFC 2047.
        Parameters:
        headerValue - raw header value bytes to encode
        charset - the charset to declare in the encoded-word
        Returns:
        RFC 2047 encoded string with selective encoding applied

      • encodeB

        public static java.lang.String encodeB​(byte[] header,
                                       java.lang.String charset)
        Encode using RFC 2047 Base64 format with specified charset. Groups nearby non-ASCII sequences to reduce fragmentation.
        Parameters:
        header - raw header bytes to encode
        charset - charset name for RFC 2047 header
        Returns:
        RFC 2047 encoded string with selective encoding applied
